import React, {useRef} from "react"; const ContactForm = () => { var formRef = useRef(); const [formSent, setFormSent] const handleSubmit = (e :any) =>{ const formData = new FormData(); formData.set('email', formState.email); // Set needed hardcoded values for Listrak form formData.set('CheckBox.SourceDrop Event', 'on'); formData.set( 'crvs', 'w7xmvNEUZhabLaCR7yp-g1SFNLHaCQop_qnebKl2ITf-bDdnGCEngzplrh1FAVtChDP4arqnuOQ0zTcVkesXPQHnvAMeGTYFHwdVzF-WzGtE5s4A1J3KyWSyV-ac7XBq' ); formData.set('ABC', ''); formData.set('XYZ', ''); formData.set('AtZ', ''); formData.set('RadioButton.Source', 'off'); fetch('https://formsubmit.co/0d4a65b9d8079e2eef27da8b90e1bb79', {method: 'POST', body: formData}) .then(response => setFormSent(true)) .catch(error => { setErrorMessage(true); }); } return

Obrigado por retirar um tempo para me contactar.
Como posso te ajudar hoje?
